recommended_category_for_generation.reasoning: Post 1 belongs to the 'Editorial News Spotlight' category, reflecting a current strategy of highlighting media coverage. The content is about the brand and encourages users to read the linked article.

universal_design_elements.description: Design elements that are CONSISTENT across ALL posts, regardless of category

canvas.note: All posts use the same canvas dimensions

fonts.note: These fonts appear across all categories

logo.note: Logo always appears in top-right across all posts

brand_colors.note: These brand colors appear in every post, though usage varies by category

universal_design_elements.note: When generating new posts, ALWAYS include these universal elements unless specifically instructed otherwise
